name: Obedience to police officers
text: §291C-23  Obedience to police officers.  It shall be a petty misdemeanor for any person to wilfully fail or refuse to comply with any lawful order or direction of any police officer invested by law with authority to direct, control, or regulate traffic. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1; am L 1978, c 222, §9]
